requirements.summary: Deploy the existing project to the Internet Computer as-is without modifying any repository files.
acceptanceCriteria: No files, folders, code, assets, dependencies, configurations, or structure are modified to complete deployment.
Deployment includes both canisters needed by the project (frontend static asset canister and Motoko backend canister), matching the projectâ€™s existing architecture.
The deployed site is publicly accessible on IC mainnet.

file_operations.description: No-op (do not change file contents): follow the existing documented deployment steps to deploy the current frontend build artifacts and associated canisters to IC mainnet exactly as provided; do not alter any code/assets/config.
No-op (do not change file contents): use only the existing install/build commands and prerequisites as documented; do not add or adjust scripts, dependencies, or configuration.

requirements.summary: Verify the live deployed site end-to-end (routes, navigation, assets, and console cleanliness).
acceptanceCriteria: All primary pages (e.g., Home, About, Services, Tour Packages, Honeymoon Offers, Vehicles, Tour Guide, Booking, Privacy) render successfully on the live URL.
All navbar/footer links and in-app navigation work without broken routes.
No missing asset/network errors when loading pages and images.
Browser console shows zero errors and zero warnings during initial load and when navigating between pages.

file_operations.description: No-op (do not change file contents): use the existing router configuration as the source of truth for which routes must be validated on the live deployment.
No-op (do not change file contents): use the existing navbar link list to drive live navigation verification across all primary pages.
No-op (do not change file contents): verify footer links (including the Home contact anchor behavior) work correctly on the live deployment without broken navigation.
No-op (do not change file contents): follow the existing verification checklist for live site testing, including checking browser DevTools Console for zero warnings/errors.

requirements.summary: Provide the final live public URL as the only output after successful deployment and verification.
acceptanceCriteria: A single public URL (e.g., https://<frontend-canister-id>.ic0.app) is produced after deployment.
The response contains only the URL and no additional explanatory text.

file_operations.description: No-op (do not change file contents): use the existing instructions for retrieving the deployed frontend canister URL and ensure the final response is exactly one URL string and nothing else.
